product_description: Stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric stays comfortable from namaste to wear-all-day in yoga-inspired drawstring shorts with a ridiculously soft peached finish.
product_details_and_care:
Stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric stays comfortable from namaste to wear-all-day in yoga-inspired drawstring shorts with a ridiculously soft peached finish.
7" inseam; 10" leg opening; 13" front rise
Elastic/drawstring waist
Front slant-patch pockets; back patch pocket
Moisture-wicking fabric engineered for dryness and comfort
83% polyester, 17% spandex
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Men's Clothing
